section1.title: Hey, Welcome!
section1.content: Thanks for stopping by! This Privacy Policy is just here to let you know how things work around here.

section2.title: What Information I Collect
section2.content: This is just a personal website, so I don’t collect much info. There’s no account creation, no tracking cookies, and definitely no sneaky data gathering. Here’s what I might collect:
section2.desc: If you reach out via email or the contact form, the info you provide is entirely up to you. I'll use it to reply and have a conversation.

section3.title: How I Use the Info
section3.content: Here's what I might do with any information I collect:
section3.listItem1: Make sure that the site experience is smooth
section3.listItem2: Improve the website based on feedback
section3.listItem3: Respond to your messages and emails

section4.title: Sharing Your Info
section4.content: I don't sell, trade or rent your personal info.

section5.title: Security
section5.content: I take security seriously, but remember that no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

section6.title: Policy Updates
section6.content: This policy is current as of Jan 2025. If I make any changes, I'll update this page.

section7.title: Got Questions?
section7.content: If you have any questions send me an email at

sanapolku.excerpt: A word game designed for aphasia patients.
sanapolku.about: A word game designed for aphasia patients to improve vocabulary and cognitive skills. Developed as part of the COMP.SWE.100 course, this project focuses on creating a user-friendly experience for a specialized audience.
sanapolku.learn: Developing larger applications with a team, integrating IndexedDB for efficient data management, and collaborating effectively with multiple developers on GitHub.
